long_description: Built with road-tested aluminum that borrows from the speedy design of high-end bike wheels, the 765g Zipp 30 Rear Wheel offers an aerodynamic advantage at a killer value. Sturdy aluminum rim uses specialized, toroidal shaping to optimize the aerodynamic profile of both the front and back halves of the wheel, smoothing airflow and reducing drag. Wider rim profile increases side-to-side stiffness for responsive sprinting and cornering; also offers great control, comfort, and strength. Hub uses stainless-steel bearings designed for seasons of maintenance-free rolling. Zipp 30 Front Wheel has a maximum tire pressure of 125 psi (8.62 bar). Please note: this wheel is clincher-compatible only and comes with Tangente butyl road inner tube with removable core (700c x 19-23mm), quick-release skewer and rim tape. Zipp recommends a maximum weight of 250 lbs. (113kg), including rider, bike and gear.
short_description: Built with road-tested aluminum that borrows from the speedy design of high-end bike wheels, the 765g Zipp 30 Rear Wheel offers an aerodynamic advantage at a killer value.
